ActJudges Act
SubjectRuth Stratton** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Stuart G. Stratton
PrecisGranting of an annuity to RUTH STRATTON, widow of the Hon. Stuart G. Stratton, a Chief Justice of New Brunswick, effective November 13, 2011.
